audio-caching
strategy.code:
class AudioCache: """Cache and reuse common audio segments"""
def __init__(self): self.cache = {} self.savings = 0
def get_or_generate(self, text, voice, model): """Use cached audio or generate new""" cache_key = f"{text}:{voice}:{model}"
if cache_key in self.cache: # Reuse existing audio self.savings += self.calculate_cost(text, model) print(f"Cache hit! Saved ${self.savings:.2f}") return self.cache[cache_key]
# Generate and cache audio = generate_audio(text, voice, model) self.cache[cache_key] = audio return audio
